attributes.action: All sports involving NATIONAL TEAMS  broadcast on free to view TV stations.
attributes.additional_details:
Many People are missing out on a real way of promoting our nations great achievements and skills in sport. Which also promotes these sport to our younger generations.
Sports encourage all people to do more for themselves and communities. Sport builds pride in people and nations.
National sport must be available to all. All our people, all generations.
All the time. This should be done solely through OUR British Broadcasting Association.
attributes.background: It is important that our nations sports are given as much exposure to the general publics possible. Public money is used to build and promote these teams. The wider public must be able to support them. These are not events that should be open solely to those that can afford to pay a subscription.
